description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Ladies' Wreath, a selection from the Female Poetic Writers of England and America with original notices and notes ... Second edition ... enlarged" Author: HALE, Sarah Josepha Buell. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11603.d.18." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1839 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001567046 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
